entry.name: Mariprofundus ferroooxydans PV-1 osmotic shock vs extraction with NaOH LC-MSMS
entry.description: Proteomic analysis was performed on protein extracts of M. ferrooxydans by following two methodologies: osmotic shock and alkalyne lysis (extraction with NaOH).

additional_fields.field: A total of 8 liters of M.ferrooxydans PV-1 was harvested on 0.22 um filters and treated for osmotic-shock per Neu and Heppel (1965). For the alkaline lysis protocol (crude extract), of a total 8 L of M. ferrooxydans PV-1 was harvested on 0.22 um filters and immersed in a total of 80 mL 0.1 N NaOH. Samples were run on SDS-PAGE gels.

Excised bands were trypsin-digested and submitted for LC-MS/MS analysis a Thermo LTQ-Orbitrap XL mass spectrometer equipped with an Eksigent Nanoliquid Chromatography 1-D plus system. The resulting MS/MS spectra were searched against the proteome of Mariprofundus ferrooxydans PV-1 in the Uniprot database using the Proteome Discoverer SEQUEST Daemon search engine.
No PTMs are included in the dataset
ftp://ftp.pride.ebi.ac.uk/pride/data/archive/2014/05/PXD000937/NaOH-protein-extraction-20121025 Core Barco Edwards Mariprofundus RB 9 RF 1049.xml
